    protected abstract Pair<LogicalPlan,SourcePlanningStats>
    createSourceAssignment(org.apache.jena.sparql.algebra.Op jenaOp)
     
    final Pair<LogicalPlan,SourcePlanningStats>
    createSourceAssignment(Query query)
    The logical plan returned by this method is a source assignment (see Definition 8 of our FedQPL paper); that is, the only types of operators that it contains are request operators (LogicalOpRequest), multiway joins (LogicalOpMultiwayJoin), and multiway unions (LogicalOpMultiwayUnion).

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • createSourceAssignment

      public final Pair<LogicalPlan,SourcePlanningStats> createSourceAssignment(Query query) throws SourcePlanningException
      Description copied from interface: SourcePlanner
      The logical plan returned by this method is a source assignment (see Definition 8 of our FedQPL paper); that is, the only types of operators that it contains are request operators (LogicalOpRequest), multiway joins (LogicalOpMultiwayJoin), and multiway unions (LogicalOpMultiwayUnion).
      Specified by:
      createSourceAssignment in interface SourcePlanner
      Throws:
      SourcePlanningException
